description: Includes built-in stage, dance floor, and high ceilings. Perfect for weddings & large conferences
Elegant chandelier lighting, divisible into 3 sections. Great for banquets and product launches
Cozy VIP pre-function area with bar setup and comfortable seating
Warm wooden finishes, ideal for breakout sessions and smaller dinners
Semi-outdoor covered terrace attached to the ballroom – cocktail & photo area
Natural daylight, classroom or theater setup. Good for seminars and workshops
U-shape boardroom layout with 75" screen and built-in video conferencing
Creative flexible space with writable walls and movable furniture
Small executive meeting room with privacy glass and high-end AV
Relaxed lounge-style space for informal discussions and coffee breaks
Open-air space with panoramic city view. Best for cocktail receptions and evening events (weather dependent)
Covered lounge area with fire pits and ambient lighting
Open standing area ideal for welcome drinks and networking
Intimate semi-private zone with cozy seating and string lights
Dedicated bar counter and high-top tables on the rooftop
Executive board table, 85-inch screen, soundproofed. Ideal for board meetings and interviews
Modern minimalist design with 75" display and wireless presentation system
Private office-style room with natural light and ergonomic chairs
Round table setup optimized for brainstorming and small team meetings
Very small enclosed booth – perfect for 1:1 calls or interviews
Outdoor covered area surrounded by lawn. Popular for intimate ceremonies and garden parties
Open lawn area – ideal for standing receptions, yoga, or outdoor dining
Small romantic gazebo surrounded by water feature – great for ceremonies
Wooden deck under fruit trees with fairy lights – evening events
Traditional stone courtyard with fountain – perfect for cultural events
